about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hey there! I'm a Brazilian web developer and system architect based in Tokyo, where I’ve been working full-time in Japanese companies for over {years} years. Fluent in English, Portuguese, and Japanese, I love coding and sharing my knowledge.

When I have free time, I sometimes create content for my <youtube>YouTube channel</youtube>, where I talk about web development with over {subscribers} subscribers. I’m also the creator of <edgestore>Edge Store</edgestore>, a SaaS service with thousands of users designed to simplify file uploads for React/Next.js projects.
